<p>
Lab25 is an innovative and highly motivated research center on Cognitive and Behavioral Science, located in the Faculty of Psychology from the National Autonomous University of MÃ©xico, in Mexico City.
Our main goal is to contribute to a better understanding of humans and non-human organisms' behaviour as an adaptative response to the structure of the envireonment they live in.
More specifically, we focus on conducting research in terms of:
Reinforcement Learning
Intertemporal choice
Risky choice
Perceptual decission making
Timing
Game Theory
Categorization
Bayesian modeling
